instructions: Tap the cell, then tap Loops. The Loop Browser opens. Do one of the following: Tap the Download button for the loop you want to add. Drag a loop from the Loop Browser to the empty cell.

Tap the Add Row button below the track headers, then tap Loops. The Loop Browser opens. Do one of the following: Tap the Download button for the loop you want to add. Drag a loop from the Loop Browser to the empty cell.

Tap the cell, then tap Loops. The Loop Browser opens. In the Loop Browser, tap Audio Files. Select the audio file you want to add. Do one of the following: Tap Download button for the audio file you want to add. Drag an audio file from the Loop Browser to the empty cell.
